block.p: Ibero American Media Partners, a joint venture between the Venezuelan media giant Cisneros Group and the private equity firm Hicks, Muse, Tate & Furst, plans to merge with a Latin American Internet portal, El Sitio, to integrate the companies' media holdings. The resulting company, Claxson Interactive Group, will be composed of the pay television provider Cisneros Television Group; Ibero American's largely Chilean broadcast television and radio assets; and El Sitio, which has operations in the United States and six Latin American countries. Stockholders will receive one common share in CIG for each El Sitio share.
